Class AbstractCommandFilter

  • java.lang.Object
    • kernel.AbstractCommandFilter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CommandFilter
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BuriedAgentsCommandFilter, DeadAgentsCommandFilter, WrongTimeCommandFilter

    public abstract class AbstractCommandFilter
extends java.lang.Object
implements CommandFilter
    An abstract base class for command filters.

      • filter

        public void filter(java.util.Collection<Command> commands,
          KernelState state)
        Description copied from interface: CommandFilter
        Filter a set of agent commands. Any illegal commands should be removed from the given collection.
        Specified by:
        filter in interface CommandFilter
        Parameters:
        commands - The commands to filter. This collection should be modified to remove any illegal commands.
        state - The state of the kernel.

        Find out if a particular command is allowed.

        state - The kernel state.
        Returns:
